title: Kansas River Hydrology Map Service
description: Hydrology layers from the Kansas Geological Survey (KGS) interactive Kansas River map. Includes channels, floodplains, and monitoring gauges. Supports research into hydrology, settlement history, and disaster events in the Kansas-Frontier-Matrix.

arcgis-service.title: ArcGIS REST Hydrology Layers
arcgis-service.description: ArcGIS service providing channels, floodplains, and gauges.
